verbs.description: [ARG0: roger stone] [V: sold] [ARG1: himself] [ARGM-MNR: as a wikileaks pipeline to trump campaign] was he when wikileaks founder julian assange appeared on a video link from europe a month before the 2016 presidential election and vaguely promised to release a flood of purloined documents related to the race the head of donald trump campaign steve bannon was interested he emailed political operative roger stone who had been trying to reach him for days about what assange might have in store what was that this morning bannon asked on oct 4 a load every week going forward stone replied echoing assange public vow to publish documents on a weekly basis until the nov 8 [C-ARG1: election trump steve bannon donald trump wikileaks roger stone] julian assange
